description: This test consists of 7 separate blocks with 8 questions or statements each, with which you can agree or disagree. You have 10 points for each block. You can assign points to no more than 3 or 4 statements in a block. If you completely agree with a statement (100%), you can give it all 10 points. At the same time, a minimum of 2 points can be assigned to a statement. Make sure that the total number of points for each block does not exceed 10.
